name: TerrainTurn5
commands: Let's explain terrain.|Certain tiles on the map provide avoidance bonuses,|these can be used to give a slight edge when facing enemies.|You can hover over a tile and a preview will be in the bottom right of the screen,|that will show the tile and any bonuses on the tile.
Um, question? Why are you sitting on a throne?
Specifically to explain rare terrain actually.|Tiles like 'Throne' and 'Fort' also provide bonus defense/resistance and heal the occupying unit per turn.

Finally I'll mention movement penalties.|As a general rule, the rougher the terrain,|the more you'll get slowed down trying to pass it.|As an example:Forests take an extra movement cost to pass.|Rivers are quite difficult to pass.|You can only get through a river 1 tile at a time.|Try to find a bridge when you're trying to pass a river.
That throne is comfortable isn't it.
Incredibly so.|Next turn I'll explain crits, level-ups, and random drops.
